summary:
SoulMaster\'s Assassin Bow
A re-textured Ebony Bow. Due to overwhelming hatred of the old texture - Now Re-textured!!
Faster re-load and base damage of 25
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/TitleLogoAssassin_zpsabec135c.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/MainTitle3_zps7e28e269.jpg[/IMG]

[size=5]SoulMaster\'s Assassin Bow
A re-textured Ebony Bow. 
Due to overwhelming hatred of the old texture - Now Re-textured!![/size] 

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/AssassinNew_zps99329106.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/2013-02-02_00003_zps432952c4.jpg[/IMG]

[size=5]SoulMaster\'s Assassin Bow can be crafted at any Forge 
Requires the Ebony Smithing Perk (3 Ebony Ingots 1 Hanging Moss)
Upgradeable (1 Ebony Ingot) and Enchantable.
It has a base damage value of 25
Faster re-load times[/size]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/2013-02-02_00004_zps6289b4ba.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/AssassinInstall_zps585d6e74.jpg[/IMG]
[size=5]Installation:
For easy installation just use the Nexus Mod Manager.
Manual install - copy the downloaded .esp and texture and meshes folders into your Skyrim\\Data folder[/size]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/2013-02-02_00006_zpsebd9d84d.jpg[/IMG]

[size=5]I hope you find this mod useful? If this mod is not to your taste, then feel free to move along to the next mod.

[color=#FF0000]Version history:
V1.0 Initial release
V1.1 New Texture[/color][/size]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/SoulMaster_zpsd3e3d3fb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well!

[color=#FFFF00]Please DO NOT upload any part of my mod any where else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII

files.name: SoulMasters Assassin Bow NEW V1-1
